title: Ask HN: I bought Voltaren at the chemist, now Google shows me ads for it. Why?
author: wideareanetwork
story_text:
How does google know I bought Voltaren?

Is my bank purchase history shared with google somehow?

I guess it could just be coincidence?

title.value: Ask HN: I bought Voltaren at the chemist, now Google shows me ads for it. Why?

story_text.value:

localize.title: Ask HN: 薬局でボルタレンを買いましたが、今度はGoogleがボルタレンの広告を表示します。なぜですか？
问HN：我在药店买了沃泰伦，现在谷歌给我显示广告。为什么会这样？
問HN：我在藥店買了沃泰倫，現在谷歌給我顯示廣告。爲什麼會這樣？
